specials.name: Channel Smite
specials.description: Sabo expends a prepared harm spell and makes a melee Strike. Instead of the normal effect of the spell, its negative damage is added to the Strike’s damage.

specials.name: Swear Vengeance
specials.description: Trigger A creature Sabo can see damages a follower of Asmodeus other than Sabo; Effect Sabo gains the effect of a 1st-level true strike spell.

specials.name: Divine Spellcasting
specials.description: DC 21, attack +13; 2nd harm (×3), restoration, see invisibility, shield
